metas.name: maboroshi
metas.description:
Genres: Drama, Fantasy, Romance Tags:Necromancy/Love Triangle/Animals Masamune, a third-year middle school student, lives in a town where all the exits have been sealed off due to a sudden explosion at a steel mill, causing time to stand still. Residents are forbidden from making any changes and spend their suffocating days in the hopes of returning to normalcy someday.

One day, Masamune's mysterious classmate Mutsumi guides him to the fifth furnace of the steel mill, where they encounter a girl who cannot speak and resembles a wild wolf. The meeting between the two girls and Masamune disrupts the balance of the world, and the unstoppable "impulse of love" from boys and girls tired of their daily lives begins to destroy the world.

metas.name: The Boy and the Heron
metas.description:
Genres: Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural Tags:Coming of Age/Fairy Tale/Animals/Adoption/Anthropomorphism/Autobiographical/Male Protagonist/Historical/Rural/Archery/War Miyazaki derived the film's title from writer Genzaburou Yoshino's 1937 masterpiece of the same name. He added that this book is a story that has great meaning to the protagonist of his film. Yoshino's book centers around a man named Koperu and his uncle, and through Koperu's spiritual growth, it discusses how to live as human beings.

(Source: Anime News Network)

metas.name: SAND LAND
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Supernatural Tags:CGI/Demons/Desert In a desert world where both demons and humans suffer from an extreme water shortage, Beelzebub, the prince of demons, and Rao, a small-town sheriff, form a tag-team and set off on an adventure in search of the Phantom Lake somewhere in the desert.

(Source: Bandai Namco Entertainment)

metas.name: Resident Evil: Death Island
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Horror Tags:Full CGI/Zombie/Survival/Guns D.S.O. agent Leon S. Kennedy is on a mission to rescue Dr. Antonio Taylor from kidnappers, when a mysterious woman thwarts his pursuit. Meanwhile, B.S.A.A. agent Chris Redfield is investigating a zombie outbreak in San Francisco, where the cause of the infection cannot be identified. The only thing the victims have in common is that they all visited Alcatraz Island recently. Following that clue, Chris and his team head to the island, where a new horror awaits them.

(Source: Sony Pictures Entertainment)

metas.name: Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon: Cosmos - Kouhen
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Mahou Shoujo, Romance
Tags:Coming of Age/Space/Henshin/Space Opera/Mythology/Demons/Shoujo/Aliens/War/Found Family/Philosophy/Cosmic Horror/Primarily Female Cast/Female Protagonist/Magic/LGBTQ+ Themes/Urban Fantasy
The second film in a duology adapting the Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon "Stars" arc.

metas.name: City Hunter The Movie: Angel Dust
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Comedy Tags: New movie project to commemorate the 35th anniversary of the City Hunter TV anime: The Final Chapter Begins.

Note: Relations are provisional and may be updated when more information is released.

metas.name: Osomatsu-san: Tamashii no Takoyaki Party to Densetsu no Otomari-kai
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Slice of Life Tags:Cute Boys Doing Cute Things/Slapstick/Twins/Primarily Male Cast/Primarily Adult Cast/Family Life/Surreal Comedy In Osomatsu-san: Tamashii no Takoyaki Party to Densetsu no Otomari-kai, the story begins with the sextuplets prepping for a takoyaki-cooking party at their home, before everything goes haywire when Totoko implies a sleepover.

(Source: Anime News Network, edited)

Note: To commemorate the 6th anniversary of Osomatsu-san anime, two new animation projects that will have a theatrical release were announced at the "Fes Matsu-san '21" event, with one in 2022, and the other the following year.

metas.name: Shin Jigen! Crayon Shin-chan THE MOVIE: Chounouryoku Daikessen - Tobe Tobe Temakizushi
metas.description: Genres: Comedy Tags:Full CGI/CGI The 31st Crayon Shin-chan film.

metas.name: Re:STARS: Mirai e Tsunagu 2-tsu no Kiraboshi
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Music, Slice of Life Tags:Twins/Idol/Crossdressing/Gender Bending Eita Hoshizora is an 18-year-old college student who has just entered university. From an early age he exceled in singing, but a certain incident makes him unable to sing in front of others.

One day, his twin sister Karina Hoshizora, a top idol,asks him to stand on stage in her place. Unable to turn down her selfish sister's request, Eita acts by pretending to be her... but ends up upsetting her sponsors and in a situation where she could be kicked out of the entertainment world! Eita struggles to regain her position as a top idol in the special world of show business, but...

In this coming-of-age idol comedy, a sister and brother switch places and live as idols!

(Source: Nautiljon & Official Site, Edited)

Note: This entry is for the theatrical Japanese release of the Chinese donghua Jintian Kaishi Zuo Mingxing, known as Re:STARS in Japan.

metas.name: Wasure Hoshi no Volicia
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Mecha, Romance, Sci-Fi Tags:Super Robot/Yuri/Aliens/Gods/Primarily Female Cast/Female Protagonist/Athletics The anime takes place in 2006, and centers on Akio Hoshigami, who due to a leg injury is forced to give up on her dream of being a track-and-field star. Akio and her friend Ayano Umisoe move on to high school together. Amidst new activities and meeting new friends, Akio gradually starts acting like herself again. Then one day Ayano suddenly disappears.

(Source: Anime News Network)
